Hi All,
   
  I am new to JUnit . In one of my test program using JUnit, i want to check wheather a collection is empty or not. I am not able to find out a proper method (Assert) that  helps to check wheather the collection is empty or not.
   
  Generally  we have like Assert.assertequals() , or like Assert.assertNull() , etc..
  Why dont we have like Assert.assertIsEmpty() ..  Is there any other method to check it.
   
  Thanks ,
   
  A.Anish Ephrem
